channel.title: Noob Question
channel.description: I am very new to private servers so this is a probably a dumb question, and also idk if this is the right section but I have 2006 remake source and want to know how to choose a client, if you have a suggestion please let me know.

item.title: Noob Question
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Your looking for 2006 client I would assume?

If so here’s a decent one: http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/457805-377-client-fullscreen-interfaces-custom-midis-sounds.html

Read full topic

item.title: Noob Question
item.dc:creator: @vlad1 vlad1
item.description:
@vlad1 wrote:

Very easy buddy.
Go to the download list and download a client and set the ip to localhost.
to do this(if it’s already not done) go to the client.java and search no-ip and replace the website looking thing with 127.0.0.1.
But other then that run your source then the client and it should open, coding for 06 servers is extremely easy and you should do fine!

Read full topic
